Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A Player is an object that has an unique view. It is an observable for the controller and it is an observer of the controller. It interact with the network. and notify the observer of the controller to let the game run.
See Also:
